ConnectionStrings.AzureServiceBusConnection: REPLACE WITH REAL CONNECTION STRING OR LEAVE EMPTY TO USE RABBITMQ
ConnectionStrings.RabbitMQConnection: REPLACE WITH REAL CONNECTION STRING OR LEAVE EMPTY TO USE SERVICE BUS

JwtOptions.Secret: THIS IS USED TO SIGN AND VERIFY JWT TOKENS, REPLACE IT WITH YOU OWN SECRET. THIS STRING SHOULD BE LONG.
